DOC.HEAD: NEW YORK: credit markets.
DOC.TEXT: The Dow Jones average of 30 industrials climbed 20.26 to 2,711.39, cutting its loss for the week to 28.16 points. Advancing issues outnumbered declines by more than 2 to 1 on the New York Stock Exchange, with 999 up, 475 down and 455 unchanged. Big Board volume totaled 120.98 million shares, against 175.15 million in the previous session. The NYSE's composite index rose 1.45 to 191.95.
